text: Welcome To Winners is the second album by the English band Lowgold, released in 2003.https://www.amazon.co.uk/Welcome-Winners-Lowgold/dp/B0000AM77B The album was again produced by former Elliott Smith associate Tony Lash and two singles were lifted from the album. The Times described the album as a "minor masterpiece". ==Track listing== All songs written by Darren Lee Ford except "Quiet Times", "Famous Last Words" and "Save Yourself" written by Dan Symons. #"Quiet Times" #"We Don't Have Much Time" #"The Same Way" #"Let Me Into Yours" #"Means To An End" #"Just A Ride" #"Keep Your Gun Dry" #"Famous Last Words" #"Clear The Skies" #"Fade Down" #"Save Yourself" ==UK singles== #"We Don't Have Much Time" (2003) #"The Same Way" (2003) ==Personnel== * Tony Lash – producer, drums * Darren Ford – vocals, guitar, drums * Dan Symons – guitar * Miles Willey – bass guitar ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:Lowgold albums Category:Sanctuary Records albums
title: Welcome to Winners
